data.persona: I plan to turn the queen into an aardvark. I am planning to steal the kingdom. I can cast a transfiguration spell from three villages away.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
There's a skull here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying a prayer book, a Potion, and a book, and wearing a ceremonial hat, a belt, and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need the skull as a potion ingredient
data.mid_motivation: I want to prepare a potion with which to transfigure the queen
data.long_motivation: I want to create confusion in the kingdom and take it over after proving I can solve their 'problems'

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit skull to crush it to pieces
